title: Unsure if I should change my IGN
body:
if u watch anime, u'd probably recognize that my IGN's acronym stands for [Sword Art Online].
And apparently (apparent only if u watch anime), there's a movie coming up for the SAO series.
Going on Youtube for some reviews shows that Yui ruins the show quite significantly, which is why i am considering changing the IGN.

replies.body: Depends on why you chose the name. If you chose it because you like that show and that character, then hold off on any decision until after you've seen the movie yourself.

i chose the name only cuz i thought Yui was gonna be gone by the time i finished ep15 (aincrad arc).
I made the name. Then i watched later episodes.
And then I find out somehow she makes it back and proceeds to ruin the show in later episodes.
Yui was better off dead tbh and i regretted my IGN since then

Yui is best girl.

EDIT: In SAO
